title: Problem with connecting to pre-game loading screen
body:
So for the last 2 days I haven't been able to get into game on my client. It started during a ranked game with no warning. Soon after champion select it told me that " a problem has been encountered and the program needs to close...ect." I have tried to go into custom games as well to test that but it doesn't work either. I've tried restarting my computer, and even tried the hextech repair tool to fix the issue.
EDIT:Solved by going into game.cfg and changing the resolution to the appropriate setting

replies.body: It sounds like something is failing the game to render and causing it to crash after champion select.  I suggest using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up by updating any outdated drivers or bad game files.  Let me know if you have any questions.
So I finally went through the steps on the guide, and my game is still not letting me into the pregame loading screen. From what steps should I take to resolve this issue?

Thanks for trying!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out individually.  I recommend grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to your ticket for context.  We'll reply back asap!
i made a ticket, and I have the tool. thanks for trying to help me out

I to am having issues with connecting to the champion load screen.  Once champ select is finished I get a black window with the windows loading circle. After a time it will make a noise and say "a problem has occurred.  I'll hit retry only to have the same result.  I have to force shut down the league client and restart it which also fails to work sometimes.

Yet my friend was over using the same router yesterday with no problems.  It must be my pc?
